# urllink

`urllink` is a simple Python library that allows you to shorten URLs and generate QR codes using online APIs.

## Features

- ğŸ”— URL Shortener via `shrtco.de` API
- ğŸ“· QR Code Generator via `goqr.me` API
- ğŸŒ Internet connectivity check before making API calls

## Installation

```bash
pip install urllink
